registration.title: Thanks for your registration.
registration.message: An email is on the way to {{email}} with the link to complete your account. In some cases it can end up in your spam folder, please double check in case you didn't receive it.

registration_validation.title: Thank you for completing your registration.

password_reset.title: Password Reset
password_reset.message: An email is on the way to {{email}} with the link to complete the password reset. In some cases it can end up in your spam folder, please double check in case you didn't receive it.

password_reset_validation.title: Your Password has been reset. Please Log In.
